message.body: How's everything? Your family?
Also￼
Just saw fabiola and she looked pissed yesterday
Oh no!!!!! Sandy fever!!!!! How can I help? I can come by tomorrow if you'd like and drive you (in ur car) to the glorified nurses office at massart?
Hey Sofie, I have a horrible case of the flu! My body is in so much pain, I can't move, it sucks.

Fabiola actually sent me an email saying sorry she forced me to leave and take care of Andy. I responded with someone had to do it, and if I answered with any hesitation, it was just my drunk speaking.
Cait I'm worried about you fuck stupid Andy drama. Also your parents and brothers and new Yorker friends all surviving sandy
Oh shit
Don't wait for Beth
Thanks Sofie, I'm going to have my friend Beth do it today. If that doesn't happen, I'll definitely want your help. Fever of 102.3..... It's pretty horrible.
Call a cab
Just get yourself to a doctor
Oh god. I'm sorry. So stressful.
I heard about buy Generators failing

Yeah, my mom is ok, she is still without power. My father is down on the Lowe East Side, dealing with the disaster of it all. Hospital administrator stuff, he said it feels a bit like 9/11 all over again.
Yeah I will, I'll call her in an hour, if she doesn't answer I'll call a cab. I've talks to the nurses at my old doctors though.
How are your parents?
Ok well keep me updated. If u need me to call u a cab let me know (sometimes fevers make every little thing so much harder)
Fine powerless but no damage
Sweatshirt stretch pants
Yeah ohhh
Do u have water
good to hear.... Yeah it's hard enough to g to the bathroom, never mind get dressed. So weak.
I'll let you know how I'm doing in a few hours.
Hehe, I will.... Yes I am drinking many and plenty of fluids!
Drink drink drink
Ok good. I'll check in in a lik
Little
Thanks!!
You ok
You getting to the hospital ?
Please let me know if things get worse
Hi Sofie, I'm doing ok, sleeping a lot and drinking alot. Thanks
Should I come over after class?
You might need to eat something?

Hi Sofie, I'm doing better. I am still taking medicine, and have a fever, but I don't have the chills. The weird thing is my stomach is bloated, but apparently that is a sign that my body is all out of wack.
Probably difficult to Keep down
Thanks Hun, it's ok, by roommates are making some roasted vegetables now. I have not been puking, I just have no appetite, and am afraid of screwing with my stomach.
Gatorade oh u are so sick. Should I come tomorrow
I could come after class if you'd like

Idk, we shall see. I honestly think I might be getting a little better. I stopped shivering. I think I just need to get my body back on order... I've had nothing but Advil, Tylenol and saltines the last two days.
